entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: New WH coronavirus procedures? @Santucci & I are told 1 measure under consideration is aides must maintain a 6 ft social distance during mtgs w/ Trump. There is a list of over a dozen people who will be tested daily before reporting to work in the west wing, per multiple sources.
